title: What's on your to-do list?
description: How much do you enjoy doing housework and paying bills?

vocabItems.definition: a boring, ordinary task you do regularly
short for 'administration' â€“  the activities and tasks you have to do to make a business, organisation or just your life, run smoothly
a company that supplies something such as electricity, gas, or water to the public
delay doing things until later, probably because you don't want to do them
an informal term to describe people who get satisfaction out of doing life admin and do lots of it
